name: v54.4.0
body:
<!-- Release notes generated using configuration in .github/release.yml at main -->

## What's Changed
### New Features & Components ðŸŽ‰
* NPM package updates for security vulnerabilities by @dependabot[bot] in https://github.com/department-of-veterans-affairs/component-library/pull/1697
* va-omb-info: Add logic to convert respondent burdern to hours & minutes by @RyanMunsch in https://github.com/department-of-veterans-affairs/component-library/pull/1909
### Fixes
* va-progress-bar: use sass file by @it-harrison in https://github.com/department-of-veterans-affairs/component-library/pull/1912
* Pin all dependencies by @ediiotero in https://github.com/department-of-veterans-affairs/component-library/pull/1911
* va-memorable-date: update Storybook examples & remove padding on legend by @jamigibbs in https://github.com/department-of-veterans-affairs/component-library/pull/1920
* va-segmented-progress-bar: Use single span for accessible text. by @RyanMunsch in https://github.com/department-of-veterans-affairs/component-library/pull/1917
* va-pagination: update aria-labels to include total pages in each label by @RyanMunsch in https://github.com/department-of-veterans-affairs/component-library/pull/1916


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/department-of-veterans-affairs/component-library/compare/v54.3.0...v54.4.0

## What's Changed
### New Features & Components ðŸŽ‰
* va-maintenance-banner: add header level prop by @jamigibbs in https://github.com/department-of-veterans-affairs/component-library/pull/1898
### Fixes

* va-alert: add screen reader text to announce alert status  by @jamigibbs in https://github.com/department-of-veterans-affairs/component-library/pull/1847
* va-tag-status: Update sr-only text and `screenReaderText` prop by @RyanMunsch in https://github.com/department-of-veterans-affairs/component-library/pull/1896

name: v54.2.0
body:
<!-- Release notes generated using configuration in .github/release.yml at main -->

## What's Changed
### New Features & Components ðŸŽ‰
* va-progress-bar: add noPercentScreenReader prop to suppress sr updates by @it-harrison in https://github.com/department-of-veterans-affairs/component-library/pull/1876
### Fixes
* va-icon: added expand_circle_right icon by @babsdenney in https://github.com/department-of-veterans-affairs/component-library/pull/1866
* va-file-input: display generic thumbnail icon for PDF files by @jamigibbs in https://github.com/department-of-veterans-affairs/component-library/pull/1874
* va-modal: fix aria-hidden handlers for modals nested inside shadow roots by @amyleadem in https://github.com/department-of-veterans-affairs/component-library/pull/1867
* va-file-input, va-file-input-multiple: clean up sr-only elements by @powellkerry in https://github.com/department-of-veterans-affairs/component-library/pull/1883
* va-file-input: Revert "adjust abbreviations of file size to full word with correct spacing for screen readers (#1872)" by @jamigibbs in https://github.com/department-of-veterans-affairs/component-library/pull/1885


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/department-of-veterans-affairs/component-library/compare/v54.1.2...v54.2.0

## What's Changed
### Fixes
* va-file-input-multiple: update label markup by @jamigibbs in https://github.com/department-of-veterans-affairs/component-library/pull/1868

## What's Changed
### Fixes

name: v54.1.0
body:
<!-- Release notes generated using configuration in .github/release.yml at main -->

## What's Changed
### New Features & Components ðŸŽ‰
* va-table: Empty cell text by @ediiotero in https://github.com/department-of-veterans-affairs/component-library/pull/1825
* va-crisis-line-modal: add params for phone numbers and links, add an option for a custom trigger element by @powellkerry in https://github.com/department-of-veterans-affairs/component-library/pull/1841
### Fixes
* va-modal: fix modal setup/teardown logic leading to modal content not being accessible by screen readers by @RyanMunsch in https://github.com/department-of-veterans-affairs/component-library/pull/1834
* va-text-input: add password input story to TextInput USWDS by @babsdenney in https://github.com/department-of-veterans-affairs/component-library/pull/1839
* va-file-input-multiple: ensure add file placeholder shows after deleting file with validation error by @powellkerry in https://github.com/department-of-veterans-affairs/component-library/pull/1846
* va-alert-expandable: update screen reader text with alert status by @jamigibbs in https://github.com/department-of-veterans-affairs/component-library/pull/1840
* va-file-input: add .heic support by @it-harrison in https://github.com/department-of-veterans-affairs/component-library/pull/1849
* va-textarea & va-text-input: fix char count iOS VoiceOver bug by @RyanMunsch in https://github.com/department-of-veterans-affairs/component-library/pull/1848
* va-combo-box: update logic to prevent duplicate optgroup headers, ensure optgroup headers show when children visible by @powellkerry in https://github.com/department-of-veterans-affairs/component-library/pull/1852
* va-file-input: fix non-interactive input in error state by @it-harrison in https://github.com/department-of-veterans-affairs/component-library/pull/1854


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/department-of-veterans-affairs/component-library/compare/v54.0.0...v54.1.0

name: v54.0.0
body:
<!-- Release notes generated using configuration in .github/release.yml at main -->

## What's Changed
### Breaking Changes
* va-file-input: always show Delete & Change file options on error messages by @it-harrison in https://github.com/department-of-veterans-affairs/component-library/pull/1832
### New Features & Components ðŸŽ‰
* va-tag-status: Add new component by @RyanMunsch in https://github.com/department-of-veterans-affairs/component-library/pull/1806
* va-select: add label-header-level prop by @powellkerry in https://github.com/department-of-veterans-affairs/component-library/pull/1824
* web-components: standardize media queries across components by @powellkerry in https://github.com/department-of-veterans-affairs/component-library/pull/1826
### Fixes
* va-file-input: bugfix for aria-labels not rendering on buttons by @powellkerry in https://github.com/department-of-veterans-affairs/component-library/pull/1819
* va-telephone: fix bug where extensions were not rendering for international phone numbers by @powellkerry in https://github.com/department-of-veterans-affairs/component-library/pull/1815
* va-file-input: prevent links from being focussed inside pdf preview by @powellkerry in https://github.com/department-of-veterans-affairs/component-library/pull/1817
* va-link-action: underline link on primary version by @powellkerry in https://github.com/department-of-veterans-affairs/component-library/pull/1820
* va-memorable-date: prevent race conditions with external validation by @it-harrison in https://github.com/department-of-veterans-affairs/component-library/pull/1831
* va-accordion-item: prevent selection of non-direct children as slot header by @powellkerry in https://github.com/department-of-veterans-affairs/component-library/pull/1835
* va-alert: add word-wrap on headline and body by @powellkerry in https://github.com/department-of-veterans-affairs/component-library/pull/1837
### Other Changes
* css-library: add elevation tokens by @powellkerry in https://github.com/department-of-veterans-affairs/component-library/pull/1833


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/department-of-veterans-affairs/component-library/compare/v53.2.0...v54.0.0

## What's Changed
### New Features & Components ðŸŽ‰
* va-accordion: create separate buttons for "expand all" and "collapse all" by @amyleadem in https://github.com/department-of-veterans-affairs/component-library/pull/1772
* va-memorable-date: add labelHeaderLevel prop by @powellkerry in https://github.com/department-of-veterans-affairs/component-library/pull/1775
* va-text-input: add the vaInput custom event by @jamigibbs in https://github.com/department-of-veterans-affairs/component-library/pull/1798
* va-text-input: add password type variation by @RyanMunsch in https://github.com/department-of-veterans-affairs/component-library/pull/1787

### Fixes
* va-table: add interactive elements to a cell by @ediiotero in https://github.com/department-of-veterans-affairs/component-library/pull/1752

* va-file-input: replace `<hr/>` element with a border on parent by @RyanMunsch in https://github.com/department-of-veterans-affairs/component-library/pull/1792

name: v53.0.0
body:
<!-- Release notes generated using configuration in .github/release.yml at main -->

## What's Changed
### Breaking Changes
* va-date, va-memorable-date, va-telephone-input, va-text-input: Update onblur validation by @powellkerry in https://github.com/department-of-veterans-affairs/component-library/pull/1760
### New Features & Components ðŸŽ‰
* va-on-this-page: Convert title list item to a header element by @amyleadem in https://github.com/department-of-veterans-affairs/component-library/pull/1759
* va-memorable-date: Add prop to remove the default date hint by @jamigibbs in https://github.com/department-of-veterans-affairs/component-library/pull/1763
### Fixes
* va-button-segmented: Update styles for two/three buttons by @RyanMunsch in https://github.com/department-of-veterans-affairs/component-library/pull/1762
* va-textarea: Fix horizontal overflow at high zoom by @amyleadem in https://github.com/department-of-veterans-affairs/component-library/pull/1768
* va-memorable-date: Add watch decorator to the value prop by @jamigibbs in https://github.com/department-of-veterans-affairs/component-library/pull/1770
* va-modal: Fix focus trap bug (and clean up component file) by @RyanMunsch in https://github.com/department-of-veterans-affairs/component-library/pull/1773


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/department-of-veterans-affairs/component-library/compare/v52.1.1...v53.0.0

name: v52.1.1
body:
<!-- Release notes generated using configuration in .github/release.yml at main -->

## What's Changed
### Fixes
* va-omb-info: remove "View" from privacy act statement button by @amyleadem in https://github.com/department-of-veterans-affairs/component-library/pull/1740
* va-telephone-input: improve error message accuracy by @powellkerry in https://github.com/department-of-veterans-affairs/component-library/pull/1726
* va-accordion-item: update headline slot approach to resolve unescaped HTML entities by @RyanMunsch in https://github.com/department-of-veterans-affairs/component-library/pull/1741
* va-telephone-input: correct width/media query breakpoint by @RyanMunsch in https://github.com/department-of-veterans-affairs/component-library/pull/1744
* va-additional-info, va-alert-expandable, va-memorable-date: adjust slot styles by @powellkerry in https://github.com/department-of-veterans-affairs/component-library/pull/1746
* va-radio and va-telephone-input: improve consistency of the error message screen reader announcement by @amyleadem in https://github.com/department-of-veterans-affairs/component-library/pull/1724
* va-date: add spacing when fields wrap by @powellkerry in https://github.com/department-of-veterans-affairs/component-library/pull/1747
* va-file-input: only show password field and additional info slot if progress bar not visible by @powellkerry in https://github.com/department-of-veterans-affairs/component-library/pull/1749


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/department-of-veterans-affairs/component-library/compare/v52.1.0...v52.1.1

name: v52.0.0
body:
<!-- Release notes generated using configuration in .github/release.yml at main -->

## What's Changed
### Breaking Changes
* va-alert-expandable: remove error variation by @RyanMunsch in https://github.com/department-of-veterans-affairs/component-library/pull/1709
### New Features & Components ðŸŽ‰
* core, web-components: upgrade React to v19 by @powellkerry in https://github.com/department-of-veterans-affairs/component-library/pull/1706
* va-tabs: Add new component by @RyanMunsch in https://github.com/department-of-veterans-affairs/component-library/pull/1693
### Fixes
* va-text-input & va-textarea: fix char count screen reader timing behavior by @RyanMunsch in https://github.com/department-of-veterans-affairs/component-library/pull/1685
* va-omb-info: add accessible description to OMB button  by @amyleadem in https://github.com/department-of-veterans-affairs/component-library/pull/1707
* va-sidenav: enhance current-page handling for truthy and false values  by @jamigibbs in https://github.com/department-of-veterans-affairs/component-library/pull/1719
* va-sidenav: use medium-screen breakpoint for mobile view by @andresriveratoro in https://github.com/department-of-veterans-affairs/component-library/pull/1722
* va-alert: add the slim prop if no headline is provided by @jamigibbs in https://github.com/department-of-veterans-affairs/component-library/pull/1718
* va-modal and va-omb-info: restore focus to trigger element after modal close by @amyleadem in https://github.com/department-of-veterans-affairs/component-library/pull/1691
* va-accordion-item: update styles for header and subheader to prevent icon alignment issues on Chrome by @RyanMunsch in https://github.com/department-of-veterans-affairs/component-library/pull/1723
* va-link: Fix icon line breaking issue for "active" variant by @RyanMunsch in https://github.com/department-of-veterans-affairs/component-library/pull/1733
* va-file-input: update â€œremoveâ€ to â€œdeleteâ€ by @jamigibbs in https://github.com/department-of-veterans-affairs/component-library/pull/1727
### Other Changes
* CSS-Library: import the usa-media-block styles from USWDS v3 package by @jamigibbs in https://github.com/department-of-veterans-affairs/component-library/pull/1716
* CSS-Library: update heading to correct values and use rem by @jamigibbs in https://github.com/department-of-veterans-affairs/component-library/pull/1725
* CSS-Library: convert mobile-typography headers from `px` to `rem` by @jamigibbs in https://github.com/department-of-veterans-affairs/component-library/pull/1731


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/department-of-veterans-affairs/component-library/compare/v51.4.0...v52.0.0

name: v51.4.0
body:

## What's Changed
### New Features & Components ðŸŽ‰

* update .nvmrc to use node 22.17.0 by @powellkerry in https://github.com/department-of-veterans-affairs/component-library/pull/1702

name: v51.3.0
body:
<!-- Release notes generated using configuration in .github/release.yml at main -->

## What's Changed
### New Features & Components ðŸŽ‰
* va-icon: add threads icon by @powellkerry in https://github.com/department-of-veterans-affairs/component-library/pull/1679
* va-file-input: add checks for empty files and min file size by @it-harrison in https://github.com/department-of-veterans-affairs/component-library/pull/1689
* va-sidenav: add component by @jamigibbs in https://github.com/department-of-veterans-affairs/component-library/pull/1658
* va-telephone: format phone number if country code defined by @powellkerry in https://github.com/department-of-veterans-affairs/component-library/pull/1695
### Fixes
* va-modal: add `label` prop for expanded `aria-label` logic. by @RyanMunsch in https://github.com/department-of-veterans-affairs/component-library/pull/1646
* va-button-segmented: update focus state style to use default yellow outline by @RyanMunsch in https://github.com/department-of-veterans-affairs/component-library/pull/1678
* va-checkbox: update analytics logic for handling description by @jamigibbs in https://github.com/department-of-veterans-affairs/component-library/pull/1674
* va-combo-box: prevent long option text from overlapping clear button by @RyanMunsch in https://github.com/department-of-veterans-affairs/component-library/pull/1680
* va-file-input: add more docs to encrypted prop by @powellkerry in https://github.com/department-of-veterans-affairs/component-library/pull/1688
* va-segmented-progress-bar: ensure focus outline shows by @powellkerry in https://github.com/department-of-veterans-affairs/component-library/pull/1692


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/department-of-veterans-affairs/component-library/compare/v51.2.0...v51.3.0

name: v51.2.0
body:
<!-- Release notes generated using configuration in .github/release.yml at main -->

## What's Changed
### New Features & Components ðŸŽ‰
* va-file-input: add password-error prop to set error on password input for encrypted files by @it-harrison in https://github.com/department-of-veterans-affairs/component-library/pull/1673
* va-file-input: add prop to reset visual state when entering error state by @it-harrison in https://github.com/department-of-veterans-affairs/component-library/pull/1682
### Fixes
* va-file-input: Updates modal text by @humancompanion-usds in https://github.com/department-of-veterans-affairs/component-library/pull/1669
* va-icon: Added mark_email_read icon by @babsdenney in https://github.com/department-of-veterans-affairs/component-library/pull/1670
* va-table: prevent table slot attributes from being added to nested spans by @powellkerry in https://github.com/department-of-veterans-affairs/component-library/pull/1675
* va-button-icon: Update spacing between icon and label text by @RyanMunsch in https://github.com/department-of-veterans-affairs/component-library/pull/1667
* va-button, va-button-icon: fix for focus outline getting covered up by @powellkerry in https://github.com/department-of-veterans-affairs/component-library/pull/1676
* va-alert-expandable: Fix TypeError on render by @longmd in https://github.com/department-of-veterans-affairs/component-library/pull/1683

name: v51.1.0
body:
<!-- Release notes generated using configuration in .github/release.yml at main -->

## What's Changed
### New Features & Components ðŸŽ‰
* va-statement-of-truth: add prop to hide legal note by @longmd in https://github.com/department-of-veterans-affairs/component-library/pull/1654
* va-promo-banner: update maturity level to deprecated by @humancompanion-usds in https://github.com/department-of-veterans-affairs/component-library/pull/1653
* va-icon: allow for custom sprite path by @powellkerry in https://github.com/department-of-veterans-affairs/component-library/pull/1660
### Fixes
* va-breadcrumbs: storybook home-veterans-affairs prop not working by @powellkerry in https://github.com/department-of-veterans-affairs/component-library/pull/1659
* va-search-input: remove aria-autocomplete from search icon button by @ediiotero in https://github.com/department-of-veterans-affairs/component-library/pull/1655
* va-telephone-input: reset errors if error prop changes to empty string by @it-harrison in https://github.com/department-of-veterans-affairs/component-library/pull/1663


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/department-of-veterans-affairs/component-library/compare/v51.0.0...v51.1.0

name: v51.0.0

## What's Changed
### Breaking Changes
* va-telephone-input: rename component from va-input-telephone and add prop to toggle internal errors by @it-harrison in https://github.com/department-of-veterans-affairs/component-library/pull/1661
### New Features & Components ðŸŽ‰
* va-button-segmented: add component by @RyanMunsch and @powellkerry in https://github.com/department-of-veterans-affairs/component-library/pull/1647
* va-search-filter: add additional sr-only text to facet titles by @jamigibbs in https://github.com/department-of-veterans-affairs/component-library/pull/1632
### Fixes
* va-checkbox-group & va-radio: fix font-weight of hint when both hint and error are set by @RyanMunsch in https://github.com/department-of-veterans-affairs/component-library/pull/1648
* va-input-telephone: add margin to top of component by @it-harrison in https://github.com/department-of-veterans-affairs/component-library/pull/1652
* va-search-input: add accessible name to search icon on small screens by @ediiotero in https://github.com/department-of-veterans-affairs/component-library/pull/1649

## New Contributors

<!-- Release notes generated using configuration in .github/release.yml at main -->

## What's Changed
### New Features & Components ðŸŽ‰
* va-telephone: Add disable-analytics prop by @RyanMunsch in https://github.com/department-of-veterans-affairs/component-library/pull/1641
* va-card: Add variation which adds an icon at the top, center by @humancompanion-usds in https://github.com/department-of-veterans-affairs/component-library/pull/1640
* va-input-telephone: Refactor validation / event emit payload by @it-harrison in https://github.com/department-of-veterans-affairs/component-library/pull/1635
### Fixes
* va-input-telephone: Update maturity value by @danbrady in https://github.com/department-of-veterans-affairs/component-library/pull/1624
* va-link: Fix external link text wrapping by @Mottie in https://github.com/department-of-veterans-affairs/component-library/pull/1625
* va-input-telephone: improve grammar of error message by @it-harrison in https://github.com/department-of-veterans-affairs/component-library/pull/1627
* va-input-telephone: Delay phone number validation until blur by @amyleadem in https://github.com/department-of-veterans-affairs/component-library/pull/1631
* va-combo-box: Restore filtering functionality by @amyleadem in https://github.com/department-of-veterans-affairs/component-library/pull/1630
* va-input-telephone: Improve screen reader experience and fix re-selection display error by @amyleadem in https://github.com/department-of-veterans-affairs/component-library/pull/1626
* va-textarea: Fix hint to ensure font-weight is normal by @RyanMunsch in https://github.com/department-of-veterans-affairs/component-library/pull/1629
* va-link-action: Show icons in print preview by @RyanMunsch in https://github.com/department-of-veterans-affairs/component-library/pull/1634
* va-segmented-progress-bar: Fix text wrap bug by @RyanMunsch in https://github.com/department-of-veterans-affairs/component-library/pull/1639
* va-additional-info: Updated the vertical bar width from 7px to 4px by @babsdenney in https://github.com/department-of-veterans-affairs/component-library/pull/1638

## New Contributors
* @babsdenney made their first contribution in https://github.com/department-of-veterans-affairs/component-library/pull/1638

<!-- Release notes generated using configuration in .github/release.yml at main -->

## What's Changed
### New Features & Components ðŸŽ‰
* va-text-input & va-statement-of-truth: add prop for adding Datadog privacy class on error message by @Mottie in https://github.com/department-of-veterans-affairs/component-library/pull/1600
* va-table: add data-sort-value attribute for raw number value sorting by @jamigibbs in https://github.com/department-of-veterans-affairs/component-library/pull/1604
* va-input-telephone: add component by @it-harrison in https://github.com/department-of-veterans-affairs/component-library/pull/1595
### Fixes
* va-combo-box: make all options persist in dropdown after selection by @it-harrison in https://github.com/department-of-veterans-affairs/component-library/pull/1602
* va-accordion: logic update to fix 2 clicks to collapse bug by @powellkerry in https://github.com/department-of-veterans-affairs/component-library/pull/1603
* va-combo-box: populate options when loading by @KyleCardwell in https://github.com/department-of-veterans-affairs/component-library/pull/1605
* va-search-filter: make headings consistent across breakpoints by @powellkerry in https://github.com/department-of-veterans-affairs/component-library/pull/1611
* va-search-filter: update accordion-items to be heading level 3 by @powellkerry in https://github.com/department-of-veterans-affairs/component-library/pull/1609
* va-alert-sign-in: replace straight apostrophes with curly ones by @RyanMunsch in https://github.com/department-of-veterans-affairs/component-library/pull/1613

## New Contributors

name: v50.1.0
body:
<!-- Release notes generated using configuration in .github/release.yml at main -->

## What's Changed
### New Features & Components ðŸŽ‰
* va-file-input and va-file-input-multiple: add password input field by @ataker in https://github.com/department-of-veterans-affairs/component-library/pull/1548
* va-critical-action: focus state styling updates and rename component by @bellepx0 in https://github.com/department-of-veterans-affairs/component-library/pull/1553
* va-breadcrumb: add prop to conditionally use #content or a custom href for the current page by @jamigibbs in https://github.com/department-of-veterans-affairs/component-library/pull/1565
### Fixes
* va-date: remove empty options by @Mottie in https://github.com/department-of-veterans-affairs/component-library/pull/1540
* va-memorable-date: Replace date processing by @Mottie in https://github.com/department-of-veterans-affairs/component-library/pull/1536
* va-combo-box: handle deleting the selected value with keyboard by @KyleCardwell in https://github.com/department-of-veterans-affairs/component-library/pull/1544
* va-link: remove duplicate screen reader content by @Mottie in https://github.com/department-of-veterans-affairs/component-library/pull/1552
* va-date: show default days with no month selected by @Mottie in https://github.com/department-of-veterans-affairs/component-library/pull/1551
* va-telephone: vanity to allow full replacement by @Mottie in https://github.com/department-of-veterans-affairs/component-library/pull/1549
* va-button: increase line-height by @powellkerry in https://github.com/department-of-veterans-affairs/component-library/pull/1545
* va-alert: add action link Storybook example & adjust header alignment by @jamigibbs in https://github.com/department-of-veterans-affairs/component-library/pull/1560
* va-combo-box: fix combo box options not populating on component re-render by @oleksii-morgun in https://github.com/department-of-veterans-affairs/component-library/pull/1564
* va-alert, va-maintenance-banner, va-modal, va-promo-banner: close icon by @powellkerry in https://github.com/department-of-veterans-affairs/component-library/pull/1557
* va-critical-action: staging review updates by @bellepx0 in https://github.com/department-of-veterans-affairs/component-library/pull/1563
* va-combo-box: aria status to include opt group count by @oleksii-morgun in https://github.com/department-of-veterans-affairs/component-library/pull/1550
* va-memorable-date: change lifecycle method for handling dash by @Mottie in https://github.com/department-of-veterans-affairs/component-library/pull/1555
### Other Changes
* CSS-Library: remove custom list styles by @jamigibbs in https://github.com/department-of-veterans-affairs/component-library/pull/1556
* CSS-Library: add semantic gutter tokens by @micahchiang in https://github.com/department-of-veterans-affairs/component-library/pull/1559
* CSS-Library: add block display to eyebrow styling class by @jamigibbs in https://github.com/department-of-veterans-affairs/component-library/pull/1566


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/department-of-veterans-affairs/component-library/compare/v50.0.0...v50.1.0

name: v50.0.0
body:
<!-- Release notes generated using configuration in .github/release.yml at main -->

## What's Changed
### Breaking Changes
* va-pagination: update for maximum of seven slots by @1Copenut in https://github.com/department-of-veterans-affairs/component-library/pull/1476
### New Features & Components ðŸŽ‰
* va-checkbox: swap out legend element  by @it-harrison in https://github.com/department-of-veterans-affairs/component-library/pull/1523
* va-alert-critical: add new component by @bellepx0 in https://github.com/department-of-veterans-affairs/component-library/pull/1533
### Fixes
* va-official-gov-banner: swap icons by @gsong in https://github.com/department-of-veterans-affairs/component-library/pull/1534
* va-alert: use headline text for alert close button ARIA label by @rsmithadhoc in https://github.com/department-of-veterans-affairs/component-library/pull/1535
* va-checkbox: fix interactive elements in description by @Mottie in https://github.com/department-of-veterans-affairs/component-library/pull/1531
* va-combo-box: when clicking into input, if no text is selected, select all of it by @KyleCardwell in https://github.com/department-of-veterans-affairs/component-library/pull/1532
* va-combo-box: user typed matches auto-select by @KyleCardwell in https://github.com/department-of-veterans-affairs/component-library/pull/1537
* Form Components: add message-aria-describedby checks by @Mottie in https://github.com/department-of-veterans-affairs/component-library/pull/1538
### Other Changes
* Storybook: remove formation imports by @powellkerry in https://github.com/department-of-veterans-affairs/component-library/pull/1524
* CSS-Library: align list styles to uswds by @powellkerry in https://github.com/department-of-veterans-affairs/component-library/pull/1508

## New Contributors
* @KyleCardwell made their first contribution in https://github.com/department-of-veterans-affairs/component-library/pull/1532

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/department-of-veterans-affairs/component-library/compare/v49.4.1...v50.0.0

name: v49.4.0
body:
<!-- Release notes generated using configuration in .github/release.yml at main -->

## What's Changed
### New Features & Components ðŸŽ‰
* va-select: add forms patterns support by @it-harrison in https://github.com/department-of-veterans-affairs/component-library/pull/1510
* va-button: Adding a fullWidth prop by @Andrew565 in https://github.com/department-of-veterans-affairs/component-library/pull/1512
* va-file-input: add percent upload support by @it-harrison in https://github.com/department-of-veterans-affairs/component-library/pull/1500
* va-select: Adding a full-width prop by @Andrew565 in https://github.com/department-of-veterans-affairs/component-library/pull/1517
### Fixes
* va-language-toggle: adjust font size and padding by @ataker in https://github.com/department-of-veterans-affairs/component-library/pull/1502
* va-accordion: prevent nested va-accordion-items from propagating up by @ataker in https://github.com/department-of-veterans-affairs/component-library/pull/1509
* va-checkbox: add normalized font size token to label by @jamigibbs in https://github.com/department-of-veterans-affairs/component-library/pull/1513
* va-checkbox: fix aria checked assignment by @rsmithadhoc in https://github.com/department-of-veterans-affairs/component-library/pull/1514
* va-need-help: align header font-size with Figma by @jamigibbs in https://github.com/department-of-veterans-affairs/component-library/pull/1520
* va-checkbox: Fix interactive elements in description by @Mottie in https://github.com/department-of-veterans-affairs/component-library/pull/1515
### Other Changes
* CSS-Library: Addition of vads-c-eyebrow class by @Andrew565 in https://github.com/department-of-veterans-affairs/component-library/pull/1503
* CSS-Library - update asset paths to reference css-library and uswds packages, add missing files to css-library by @powellkerry in https://github.com/department-of-veterans-affairs/component-library/pull/1519


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/department-of-veterans-affairs/component-library/compare/v49.3.0...v49.4.0

## What's Changed
### New Features & Components ðŸŽ‰

* va-combo-box: Add option groups functionality by @oleksii-morgun in https://github.com/department-of-veterans-affairs/component-library/pull/1478
* va-table: Enabling stacked tables to always be full-width by @Andrew565 in https://github.com/department-of-veterans-affairs/component-library/pull/1501
